name: Dissociation (demicatt)
description:
In Dissociation, you play as as a mysterious man with multiple personalities and your objective is to escape the evil scientists attempting to subdue you. The personalities range from a 10 year old boy to an 80 year old man who believes he is a wizard. While they may be at odds with one another, at the end of the day they share a heart and must learn to accept one another for who they are. 

//CONTROLS

WASD to move // Spacebar to dash (kid only) // Left Mouse Click to attack (Wizard & Solider only)

//CREDITS

Art by Ric Molinar, Nicholas Theriot, and Hayden Hanna

Code by Reed Pafford, Ric Molinar, and Hayden Hanna

Music by Hayden Hanna

//RESOURCES

Unity 3.3, Chat GPT, Photoshop, Procreate, FL Studio, Aesprite, Pyxel Edit
